sense.name: the quantity of ownership in an asset
sense.examples: John applied for a home equity loan. They have put a lot of sweat equity into their electronics startup. You will build up equity faster with a 15-year mortgage than with a 30-year one. The principals control about 30 percent of the equity of that company. Their firm controls companies mostly through debt rather than equity.

sense.name: fairness, justness
sense.examples: There is no equity in traffic court. The equity of his claims is dubious. The school tries to treat all the students with equity.
